title: 求一些适合建筑党用的模组
author: 沙雕源奕
txt_content: 求大佬推荐一些适合建筑党用的模组，能复制建筑，不用背指令。最好带汉化。

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
[1.15.2-1.6.4][SSP/SMP][Forge/Fabric]WorldEdit——创世神Mod[永久更新]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-422617-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

replies.author: crfst99936484
replies.txt_content:
原版就可以做到复制建筑
用clone或者结构方块

replies.author: MC的NORTH
replies.txt_content: ism mod?https://instant-structures-mod.com/ 真 复制建筑XD

replies.author: McprojectEX
replies.txt_content:
[1.15.2][建筑党]Maper

replies.author: McprojectEX
replies.txt_content:
[1.12.2]建筑整合包2.0[渣机福利][持续更新][已更新到2.0]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-905053-1-1.html
2个版本，建筑系列的多有了
如果没有更好的建筑魔杖，建议去下载一个
